name: Ball Rolling Down A Hill
description:
Summary: Ball is rolling down a hill, avoiding obstacles, collecting coins, and trying to make it to the finish line

Gameplay: You control the ball which has to collect coins but avoid obstacles

Instructions:

  • Use left/right arrow keys, or A/D keys, or game controller to move ball left and right
  • Avoid the obstacles and collect as many coins as you can
  • The number of coins you collect will be displayed when you cross the finish line
